scripts.dev: npm run ensure:frontmatter && npm run sync:post-assets && astro dev
scripts.build: npm run ensure:frontmatter && npm run sync:post-assets && astro build
scripts.preview: npm run ensure:frontmatter && npm run sync:post-assets && astro preview
scripts.deploy: npm run ensure:frontmatter && npm run sync:post-assets && astro build && gh-pages -d dist
